label_teim: Rock and Roll Hall of Fame 16th Annual Induction Ceremony Version 1 Act 7 of 8, Tape 7 of 8, 3/21/2001
label_ssm: Rock and Roll Hall of Fame 16th Annual Induction Ceremony Version 1 Act 7 of 8, Tape 7 of 8, 3/21/2001
summary_teim: Chris Blackwell is inducted in the 2001 ceremony. Includes performances by Paul Simon, Mary J. Blige, Bono, Melissa Etheridge, and Aerosmith.
summary_ssm: Chris Blackwell is inducted in the 2001 ceremony. Includes performances by Paul Simon, Mary J. Blige, Bono, Melissa Etheridge, and Aerosmith.
contents_teim: Bono inducts Chris Blackwell -- Chris Blackwell accepts his award -- Could you be loved ; Get up stand up (Mary J. Blige, Bono, Melissa Etheridge) -- The train kept a rollin' (Aerosmith) -- Me and Julio down by the schoolyard (Paul Simon, Dion)
contents_ssm: Bono inducts Chris Blackwell -- Chris Blackwell accepts his award -- Could you be loved ; Get up stand up (Mary J. Blige, Bono, Melissa Etheridge) -- The train kept a rollin' (Aerosmith) -- Me and Julio down by the schoolyard (Paul Simon, Dion)

abstract_ssm: At 2001 Induction Ceremony -- Bono inducts Chris Blackwell -- Video montage of Chris Blackwell -- Chris Blackwell accepts his award -- Could You Be Loved; Get Up Stand Up (Mary J. Blige, Bono, and Melissa Etheridge) -- Jaded introduction, then Train Kept-A-Rollin' (Aerosmith) -- Me and Julio (Paul Simon with Dion and Marc Antony and Jann Wenner)
